resources.string: Have a panic attack, you have earned it
I am choosing kindness over anger, towards myself, I mean. Fuck everyone else
You miss all the chances you dont take. But lets be honest, you fuck up all of the ones you do.
Just be yourself. But not the real you. No one wants to see that shit
Some days are better than others. Today is not one of them.
Dont be sad that its over. Be sad because you fucked it up
Stop worrying about what other people think. I mean, have you met other people? They are awful
dont be sad. You are making everyone uncomfortable.
Things will unfold at precisely the right time.
You are capable of anything. Seriously, you scare me
